name: Globalogix, Inc.
tag_list: web-application-development, rich-internet-application-development, mobile-application-development, system-integration, software-testing, quality-assurance-services, broadband-wireless-deployment-and-management, onsite-consulting-services
overview:
Globalogix is a full featured custom IT Development and consulting services company, since 1993.

Globalogix specializes in offering Web Application Development, Rich Internet Application Development, Mobile Application Development, System Integration, Software Testing, Quality Assurance services, Broadband Wireless Deployment and Management, and Onsite Consulting Services. Globalogix is a committed team of professionals whose aim is to provide our customers with performance driven software solutions. Our Mission is to provide utmost customer satisfaction through integrity, performance, reliability, and service, while continually considering their economic impact and subsequent return on investments within the IT Development industry.

milestones.description: GLOBALOGIX ACQUIRES BLAST ENERGY SERVICES SATELLITE DIVISION
